author: Whoopi Goldberg
message: Were here for a reason. I believe a bit of the reason is to throw little torches out to lead people through the dark.
title: Thought of the day

author: Anthony Robbins
message: To effectively communicate, we must realize that we are all different in the way we perceive the world and use this understanding as a guide to our communication with others.
title: Thought of the day

author: Confucius
message: Ability will never catch up with the demand for it.
title: Thought of the day

author: Albert Schweitzer
message: Never say there is nothing beautiful in the world any more. There is always something to make you wonder in the shape of a tree, the trembling of a leaf.
title: Thought of the day
